file:///workspace/my-family-clinic/Proje.title: Project Architecture Document v2.1
file:///workspace/my-family-clinic/Proje.info: Complete project overview, technology stack, file structure (215,000+ lines), performance metrics (Core Web Vitals: LCP 1.8s, FID 45ms, CLS 0.08), quality scores (94.2% overall), 12 development phases completed, deployment strategies on Vercel/Supabase, CI/CD pipeline implementation

file:///workspace/my-family-clinic/packa.title: Package.json - Dependencies and Scripts
file:///workspace/my-family-clinic/packa.info: Complete dependency inventory with versions, scripts for development (30+ npm scripts), testing framework configuration (compliance, performance, accessibility), production build setup

file:///workspace/my-family-clinic/prism.title: Prisma Database Schema
file:///workspace/my-family-clinic/prism.info: Comprehensive database schema with 7440 lines of models, PostGIS integration, healthcare-specific entities, compliance models (ConsentRecord, AuditLog), indexing strategies for performance optimization

file:///workspace/docs/technical/api-ref.title: API Reference Documentation
file:///workspace/docs/technical/api-ref.info: Complete API documentation for tRPC endpoints, 29 healthcare API routers, authentication (NextAuth 5), rate limiting policies (1000-100 requests/hour), WebSocket subscriptions for real-time features, error handling

file:///workspace/database/database-docu.title: Database Documentation
file:///workspace/database/database-docu.info: Database architecture documentation, PostGIS geospatial integration, healthcare compliance framework (PDPA, MOH), performance optimization strategies, security and data protection measures, backup and recovery procedures

https://www.fda.gov/regulatory-informati.title: Content of Premarket Submissions for Device Software Functions
https://www.fda.gov/regulatory-informati.info: FDA guidance on medical device software documentation requirements, including system architecture, data flow diagrams, and risk management documentation

https://www.hhs.gov/sites/default/files/.publisher: U.S. Department of Health and Human Services
https://www.hhs.gov/sites/default/files/.title: HIPAA Security Rule Technical Safeguards
https://www.hhs.gov/sites/default/files/.info: Comprehensive HIPAA technical safeguards requirements for medical software, including access control, audit controls, integrity measures, and transmission security documentation standards

https://openregulatory.com/articles/medi.title: Medical Device Software Architecture Documentation (IEC 62304)
https://openregulatory.com/articles/medi.info: IEC 62304 requirements for medical device software architecture documentation, including high-level system diagrams, interface documentation, and visual representation best practices

https://www.hipaajournal.com/hipaa-compl.title: HIPAA Compliance for Medical Software Applications
https://www.hipaajournal.com/hipaa-compl.info: Detailed requirements for HIPAA-compliant documentation in medical software, including business associate agreements, security management processes, and training documentation requirements

https://enlil.com/blog/fda-software-as-a.title: FDA Software as a Medical Device Guidelines
https://enlil.com/blog/fda-software-as-a.info: Comprehensive FDA SaMD guidelines covering regulatory compliance, documentation practices, quality systems, cybersecurity requirements, and postmarket responsibilities

https://sunstonepilot.com/2021/08/docume.title: Documentation for Medical Device Software
https://sunstonepilot.com/2021/08/docume.info: Medical device software documentation requirements including IEC 62304 processes, FDA guidance comparison (old vs new), template examples, and compliance presentation standards

https://github.com/openregulatory/templa.title: Healthcare Technology Regulatory Compliance Templates
https://github.com/openregulatory/templa.info: Free templates for ISO 13485, IEC 62304, ISO 14971 and IEC 62366 compliance, provided as markdown files and downloadable in multiple formats
